A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Crappy rehash of scenes and elements from the original trilogy\, crammed with 2017 political correctness and SJW agenda. Horrible pacing\, not a single lightsaber duel in the entire movie\, pointless uninteresting side characters\, ruining the SW universe by randomly changing the rules in ways that make no sense in the context of all previous movies (if you can weaponize hyperdrive like that why didnt they just destroy both Death Stars with it etc.). Disney killed this franchise.
